vision.notes: Rails generally have good vision, useful for foraging and navigating complex wetland environments. Color vision is likely present but not explicitly stated in given sources.

audition.notes: Audition is important for communication and predator detection. Vocalizations are known, though frequency range is not specified in the provided context.

tactition.notes: Tactile senses are important for foraging in dense vegetation and nesting. They build nests (Eulabeornis castaneoventris) implying tactile sensitivity.

olfaction.notes: Olfactory capabilities in rails are not mentioned in the provided context. It is unknown whether they rely heavily on scent.
